title: How to check if my pixel 4a 5G is brand new/used and the phone has not been powered on before?
content:
How to check if my pixel 4a 5G is brand new or used, or check the phone has not been powered on before?
I bought it from a reliable shop but i have suspicion that after asking for replacement the phone was replaced with a used one. It is just a suspicion so i need to check that?

Thanks
